extendedInfo.description: FT Mobile App DescriptionWhen youâve got big things to do, you need to be connected to your finances no matter what. We understand that youâre busy. So whether itâs in a branch or on your phone, we do whatever we can to make your life as easy as possible. With our mobile app, youâll stay wired to your money 24/7 and youâll be able to bank from wherever you are. With the First Tech mobile app, you can:ACCESS YOUR ACCOUNTS ANYTIME, ANYWHEREâ¢	Check account balancesâ¢	View transaction historyCOMPLETE TRANSACTIONSâ¢	Transfer funds between First Tech accountsâ¢	Make deposits with Mobile e-depositâ¢	Pay bills on the fly FIND FIRST TECHâ¢	Search for a nearby branchâ¢	Get hours and contact informationLOCATE ANY ATM IN THE COUNTRYâ¢	Green pins on map mark over 28,000 ATMs, free for all membersDonât confine your finances to the walls of a branch. We want your banking to be as effortless as possible, even after you leave the building. With the First Tech mobile app, youâre always connected to your money, no matter where life takes you.

reviews.title: OK Initial Launch
reviews.comment: August \'13 Update: has decent layout and flow design, but two key issues:  1. Runs pretty slow, just like the website...maybe not the app\'s fault but slow servers still? 2. STILL can\'t view pending charges on each account like the website can. Very important feature for banking...surprised it hadn\'t been added after all this time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs a \"home\" or \"accounts\" button after transactions
reviews.comment: App works great for me! I especially get heavy use of the e-deposit and transfer functions. This leads to a particularly annoying issue however. After completing a transfer or deposit, I\'m stuck at the \"successful\" screen. My only options are to hit my phones back button, which takes it to trying to do the transfer again, or completely back out, force stop the program, and re-open it. This could simply be solved with a \"home\" or \"back to accounts\" button on the \"successful\" page.
reviews.author: Kirk Webster

reviews.title: Stopped Working
reviews.comment: The August 23rd update is no longer working on my tablet (Galaxy Tab 2 10.1). It shows the splash screen and then crashes.
reviews.author: Arion Clarke

reviews.title: Does what I need
reviews.comment: I just deposit checks mostly, I live to far from a bank.  But lately the app won\'t even open for me.  The FTCU screen pops up, then it justs shuts down.  Please fix this fast
reviews.author: Maria Johnson

reviews.title: Hangs up requiring power-cycle on Samsung SII
reviews.comment: Trying to deposit a check. Photograph front. Photograph back - app freezes with pic of back of check. Eventually Android message saying app not responding.   Reset phone. Tried twice - same result.
reviews.author: Terry Perkinson

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Easy to use. Not too big of a thumb print. My husband and I use it constantly to deposit checks and complete transfers!
reviews.author: Megan Payne

reviews.comment: Solid app, never had an issue!
reviews.author: Shane Evans

reviews.title: Do Not Use Bill Pay
reviews.comment: Mostly, the app works great. Just don\'t use the bill pay. I had a bunch of missed payments because it was allowing me to set up payments but wasn\'t specifying what account to take them from. I also never got notification that these payments weren\'t being made. I had assumed it would just take them from the default account I had set through the website. There is nowhere in the app to change this.
reviews.author: Geoffrey Moore

reviews.title: Bad.
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t support high resolution screens. Bad interface. This is in serious need of an update
reviews.author: Tyler Bell

reviews.title: Good start
reviews.comment: e-Deposit feature doesn\'t work well. Doesn\'t indicate if front or back image needs be be retaken. View of account info and details is limited.
reviews.author: Scott Molloy

reviews.title: Don\'t know what you would expect
reviews.comment: Works well. I transfer money and pay my credit card. Reflects account balances accurately. Don\'t think there could be a lot more expected.
reviews.author: Stephanie Brown

reviews.title: Please add tablet support
reviews.comment: I love this app on my phone, but would really like to use it on my new Nexus 7 as well. Please add support for tablets, whether it\'s a stretched version of the phone app or a real tablet interface.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works well... still needs a tablet version
reviews.comment: I have been using FTCU mobile apps since February, 2009, first on my old iPhone 3g... and most recently on my SG3. The apps have always been flawless on both phones.  Yes, they are no as feature rich as on your PC... but it is a mobile app.  I have absolutely no issues with e-deposit.  I have deposited over a dozen checks since last November and all deposits worked 1st time, every time. As far as those who want their user ID and passwords saved... are you crazy??  This is your bank account!  So you don\'t care if someone gets a hold of your phone and they have access to you banking business?  Please, First Tech... DO NOT CHANGE THIS FEATURE! I will rate this app 5 * when a tablet version is available.
reviews.author: George Cano

reviews.title: Does what I need it to do.
reviews.comment: Would be great if I could setup bill pay within app (mainly to send checks to individuals)
reviews.author: JP Freeman

reviews.title: Crashes on Samsung Note 10.1
reviews.comment: Works great on my phone.  Crashes on my Samsung note 10.1 tablet.  Please fix!
reviews.author: Travis Ryan

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Completely stopped working. It closes itself after 15 seconds or so. Sucks because I love being able to deposit checks on my phone
reviews.author: Kirsti Clapsadle

reviews.title: Good app, finally works
reviews.comment: I was finally able to make an eDeposit today with my Samsung Replenish. The app should be better at warning about busy servers. Also, the refresh/submit button in the upper right corner should be a different background than the top bar to make it stand out. I was able to quickly scan my accounts and found a mistake with BillPay. This app is worth the download!
reviews.author: A Google User
